NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 PHLOX: Papa, the jellyfish are visiting the surface again! 2 1 PLUME: What?! This consistency is unprecedented.. Did they not visit the surface yesterday as well? 3 2 PLUME: Oh, how I wish the others could be here to assist me in collecting more data on this phenomenon! 4 3 PLUME: An update: It has been some time, yet the jellyfish still remain on the planet's surface. This is truly peculiar. 5 4 PLUME: We have never observed them staying on the surface for so long before.. What could possibly be causing this phenomenon? 6 3 PHLOX: Where have Thatch, Melorae and Coleus gone, papa? 7 6 PLUME: They set off this morning for a new expedition, Phlox. Thank goodness we stayed behind to see this exciting phenomenon - but what a shame for it to only occur now in their absence! LC EX4 7
